transcript: the thing that will get you the biggest pay increase is being someone worthy of a higher pay increase and so this is where a lot of people end up in hot water they insist on having all these things on their first job rather than being willing to get the experience that they can then leverage to get the far bigger paying job in the future because then they can State the facts and tell the truth that I really did this thing and I think if I did this thing for you you would make this much and I'm just asking for a percentage of that
